data.title: Top 6 Stocks in GuruFocus Users' Christmas Wish Lists
data.text: As we look ahead to the Christmas holiday, GuruFocus users have placed several stocks on their Christmas wish lists. According to GuruFocus Baskets statistics, the six most-popular stocks in the "Considering" virtual basket as of Wednesday are Biogen Inc. (NASDAQ:BIIB), Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL), Intel Corp. (NASDAQ:INTC), Bank of America Corp. (NYSE:BAC), Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ:FB) and Microsoft Corp. (NASDAQ:MSFT).

data.title: BofA Reinstates Coverage Of Cloud Stocks, Names Top Picks For 2021
data.text: Cloud services is one segment that has gotten a big boost in 2020 due to the pandemic, with many cloud stocks up big year-to-date. On Wednesday, BofA Securities reinstated coverage of five cloud stocks and named its top picks in the group.

data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Announces Safe Gaming Partnership
data.text: Microsoft's (MSFT) partnership with rivals Nintendo (NTDOY) and Sony (SNE) aims at protecting younger and more vulnerable players.

data.title: Amazon asks judge to set aside Microsoft's $10B DoD JEDI cloud contract win
data.text: It's been more than two years since the Pentagon announced its $10 billion, decade long JEDI cloud contract, which was supposed to provide a pathway to technological modernization for U.S. armed forces. While Microsoft was awarded the contract in October 2019, Amazon went to court to protest that decision, and it has been in legal […]

data.title: 7 Big Data Stocks That Are Feeding Our Information Addiction
data.text: These big data stocks are the needle-movers of the industry and will leverage big data to make our lives easier and much more informed. The post 7 Big Data Stocks That Are Feeding Our Information Addiction appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: 4 Dividend Ideas To Stuff Your Stockings With For The Holidays
data.text: Stocks that pay dividends are the gifts that keep giving and perfect for the holiday season. I think a few shares of some well known companies such as Apple, Microsoft, AT&T or Coca-Cola is a great idea as a stocking stuffer.
